ygData.subject: Re: Aproaching the Alliance base...
ygData.msgSnippet: Shokaract dodges. (He is a distance away.) Airbomber raises his hand as he hit hit. Burning Hammer reaches down and grabs Time Warp. He spins around a knife

Subject: Re: Aproaching the Alliance base...

From: "THECODE" <thecode@...>

Shokaract dodges. (He is a distance away.) Airbomber raises his hand as he
hit hit. Burning Hammer reaches down and grabs Time Warp. He spins around a
knife and slashes Time Warp. Time Warp's right arm falls off. Burning Hammer
lets him drop. He drops a grenade by Time Warp and Airbomber and heads into
the battle. Serge, in beast mode, arives and looks down at Burning Hammer.
Burning Hammer looks up and sees revenge in Serge's eyes. Burning Hammer
stands still. Serge fires eye rays at Burning Hammer, and he falls over,
twisting in pain. He stops moving. Serge waits. Nothing happens. Serge grabs
Burning Hammer in his mouth and swallows. Serge winces in pain as dual
swords pierce through the sides of his throat, spilling mech fluid
everywhere.Burning Hammer climbs from Serge's throat and lands on the
ground. Watching the giant gaze weakly.

"Now, do you want to have a realistic fight or one where I just cut your ass
up?" Burning Hammer asks. Serge had been tricked, how could he be so stupid?
He transforms and fires again and again, Burning Hammer moves slightly
everytime and dodges entirely. Burning Hammer fires off into the distance
and hits Diskus. The grenade near Airbomber and Time warp ticks down to 5,
4, 3...
----- Original Message -----
From: <Yanshosh@...>
To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
Sent: Friday, October 13, 2000 12:16 PM
Subject: Re: Aproaching the Alliance base...


> Congrats on the football game, KSL!
>
> If you want to join a battle, Airshadow, DevilDuer can lead your new
> bot to the one at the Alliance base.
>
> ::Zardus/Bloodystrike/DevilDuer/Havoc::
>
> Zardus growls, looking at the attacking group. "Kill them," he
> replies to Bloody Hammer.
>
> "We are under attack. Engage and kill all the invaders," he says to
> Scattershot, Nemesis, Serpentor, and Unitron as he takes careful aim,
> firing his plasma launcher at Shockaract.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Bloodystrike flies in behind Shockaract's group, recieving Zardus'
> orders. He takes out his rocket launcher, firing it at Airbomber.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> DevilDuer stops in his tracks, his face breaking into a smile as he
> recieves Zardus' transmission. Battle was good, better than chasing
> some bot.
>
> He nearly crashes into the pod before he sees it, stopping a few
> inches in front of it (Airshadow's new char). He smiles, looking at
> it and waiting for it to scan a beast mode.
> ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
> Havoc nods, checking his internal scanner as he looks at Chaos and
> Minion.
>
> "Gunfire! There's a battle at the nearest base," he suddenly says,
> his eyes lighting up at the thought of battle, "Let's go."
>
> He transforms into his Ju 87 Stuka (German WW2 jet, the one with the
> sirens), flying off toward the Alliance base. Repressor, transforming
> into an attack chopper, follows after him.
>
>
>
> --- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> > Burning Hammer ran outside and looked off and seen Shokaract's team.
> >
> > "Looks like they are just standing there, not doing anything, maybe
> they are
> > peaceful? I hope not." Burning Hammer says. Airbomber and Time Warp
> slowly
> > walk up to the Alliance base, and come right up to Burning Hammer.
> >
> > "I await orders good old fearless leader." Burning Hammer says
> through
> > commlink to Zardus. Time Warp started to say something and then
> fired a bolt
> > into Burning Hammer's head. Burning Hammer falls and lays there.
> Time Warp
> > aims at the base, but is knocked over. Burning Hammer is up and
> punching
> > away at him. Airbomber points his gun at the back of Burning
> Hammer's head.
> > Burning Hammer swings his hand and knocks it across the landscape.
> Hefires a
> > fireball into Airbomber and blasts him backwards. Burning hammer
> beats on
> > Time Warp until he's bloody, and then stands up.
> >
> > "Still awaiting orders, what should I do with these here 2?"
> Burning Hammer
> > asks Zardus...
>
>
>
>
>
